title: Spaghetti with tomato and aubergine sauce
ingredients: ['120ml olive oil', '1 large aubergine, cut into 1.25cm cubes', '1 large green pepper, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '175g tomato puree', '1 tablespoon sugar', '250ml water', '450g uncooked spaghetti']
